Features.internationalReachDescription: Present in Africa, Europe and America
Features.whoAreWeDescription1: At AWD Tech, we are revolutionizing digital by creating innovative technological products that transform society, stimulate business growth and support entrepreneurs.
Features.whoAreWeDescription2: We operate in several countries in Africa, Europe and America and we are dedicated to supporting companies in the planning and management of the different layers of their organizations thanks to digital tools.
Features.joinUs: Join the many companies that trust us for their digital transformation.

FeaturesTwo.missionDescription: At AWDTECH, Our mission is to offer digital solutions that are themselves continuously improved and allow for the continuous evolution of business for economic operators, and the quality of life of African populations. Quality is not optional at AWDTECH
FeaturesTwo.offerDigitalSolutionsDescription: Provide cutting-edge digital solutions that enable continuous business evolution and growth
FeaturesTwo.improveQualityDescription: Develop innovative technological products that improve the quality of life of individuals and communities
FeaturesTwo.enableBusinessEvolutionDescription: Empower businesses to evolve and adapt to the digital landscape through our comprehensive digital services

WhyUs.qualityOfCustomerRelationship: The quality of the customer relationship
WhyUs.qualityOfCustomerRelationshipDescription: We prioritize transparent communication and personalized support for each client.
WhyUs.flexibilityAndAdaptabilityDescription: Our solutions adapt to your specific needs and evolve with your business.
WhyUs.methodologyAdaptedToClientsDescription: Tailor-made approach that aligns perfectly with your objectives and constraints.
WhyUs.whyUsDescription: Discover the reasons that make us the partner of choice for your digital transformation.
WhyUs.clientSatisfactionDescription: Our clients recommend us for our expertise and our commitment to delivering exceptional results.

Team.teamDescription: Meet the visionaries and leaders who drive our mission forward. Our team is composed of passionate, experienced, and dedicated professionals who work tirelessly to achieve excellence and innovation.
Team.joinOurTeam: Become a Part of Our Team
Team.joinOurTeamDescription: Are you passionate about technology and innovation? We are always looking for new talent to join our dynamic team. Explore our career opportunities and contribute to exciting projects.

ceo.name: GOGBEU OULAI Patrice
ceo.description: Founder and CEO of AWDTECH, visionary leader with expertise in digital transformation and technological innovation. He directs the company's overall strategy and oversees operations across Africa, Europe, and America.

deputyCeo.name: TOUA BITCHIE ANGE M
deputyCeo.description: Deputy CEO of AWDTECH, responsible for daily operations and coordination of technical teams. Expert in digital project management and strategic business development.

financialDirector.name: GUEU KALE SIMON
financialDirector.description: Financial Director at AWDTECH, leading the company's financial strategy, including planning, management, and reporting. Expert in financial analysis, investment, and corporate finance to ensure sustainable growth.

financeAnalyst.name: BRUCE GUI
financeAnalyst.description: Control & Finance Analyst at AWDTECH, expert in financial management, cost analysis, and management control. Specialized in optimizing financial resources and strategic budget planning.

communicationManager.name: KOFFI AKISSI ELEONORE
communicationManager.description: Communication Manager at AWDTECH, expert in communication strategy, public relations, and brand image management. Specialized in developing digital marketing campaigns and corporate communication.

directeurGeneral.name: DROH TIEFFING
directeurGeneral.description: Directeur Général et le financier at AWDTECH, responsible for the overall management and financial strategy of the company. Expert in financial planning and corporate governance.

DesignProcess.title: Our Design Process
DesignProcess.subtitle: A user-centered approach that delivers exceptional results

step1.name: Understand
step1.description: We start by understanding your business, your goals, and your users' needs through comprehensive discovery sessions.

step2.name: Explore
step2.description: We explore different ideas and concepts through sketching, wireframing, and mood boarding to find the perfect solution.

step3.name: Create
step3.description: We bring the best ideas to life through high-fidelity mockups and interactive prototypes that showcase the final experience.

step4.name: Refine
step4.description: We gather feedback, test our designs with real users, and iterate until we achieve perfection in every detail.
